column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Hezekia n’afe a otsia duanan no mu no
column3: nna Asiriahen Senakerib fowee baa Juda nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban nyinara do

column2: "Na Asiriahen somaa Rabsake ma ofi Lakis dze dɔm kɛse baa ɔhen Hezekia nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm. Na obegyinaa etsifi nsutaae a ɔwɔ ɔtanhofo haban ne tsempɔn no do suka no ho."
"Nna Hilkia ba Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column3: na ɔkyerɛwfo Sebna
column4: na Asaf ne ba ɔsɛnkaafo Joa

column2: "Na Rabsake no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Afei hom nka nkyerɛ Hezekia dɛ
column7: Awerɛhyɛmu bɛn nye yi a edze wo werɛ hyɛ mu yi?"

column2: "Meka dɛ
column3: w’egyinatu na w’ahoɔdzen wɔ ɔsa ho no
column4: ɔyɛ nsɛnhun kwa: afei woana na etwer no
column5: ma atsew mo do etua yi?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔwo etwer ndzɛmbir a ebu yi no poma do
column4: mekyerɛ Egypt do a; ɔno no do na sɛ nyimpa biara twer a
column6: na ohwira mu: mbrɛ Egypthen Farao tse dze ma hɔn a wɔtwer no do nyinara nye no."

column2: "Na sɛ ese me dɛ
column3: Yɛtwer EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn a: ana nnyɛ ɔno na Hezekia eyiyi ne mbea sorɔnsorɔm na n’afɔrmbukyia
column4: na ɔase Juda na Jerusalɛm dɛ
column5: Afɔrmbukyia yi enyim na hom nsɔr no?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: meserɛ wo
column4: enye mo wura Asiriahen no nkyiakyia
column6: kyerɛ dɛ w’afamu ibotum ama nyimpa atsenatsena hɔn do."

column2: "Na ibodua dɛn koraa etum adan mo wura no nkowaa nketseaba mu ɔsafohen baako n’enyi
column3: ma osian atseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo ntsi edze woho akɔtwer Egypt yi?"

column2: "Ana afei mekwetsir EWURADZE na maba asaase yi do dɛ merebɛsɛɛ no? EWURADZE na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Fow kɔ asaase yi do

column2: "Nna Eliakim na Sebna na Joa see Rabsake dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo
column4: kasa kyerɛ wo nkowaa wɔ Siria kasa mu; na yɛtse
column5: na mma nnye hɛn nnkasa wɔ Judafo kasaa mu wɔ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ɔfasu no do no asomu."

column2: "Na Rabsake see dɛ
column3: Ana mo wura asoma me dɛ membɛka nsɛm yi nkyerɛ wo wura
column4: na ɔwo a? Ana nnyɛ nkorɔfo a wɔtsetse ɔfasu do no nkyɛn na wɔasoma me
column5: dɛ wɔnye hom ndzi hɔnankasa hɔn egyanan
column6: na wɔnye hom nnom hɔnankasa hɔn dwansee?"

column2: "Nna Rabsake gyinae na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu wɔ Judafo kasaa mu
column3: na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔhen se nye yi
column3: Mma hom mma Hezekia ndaadaa hom; na orunntum nngye hom:"

column2: "Nkyii so mma hom mma Hezekia mma hom nntwer EWURADZE
column3: dɛ
column4: Ɔgye ara na EWURADZE bɛgye hɛn; wɔremmfa kurow yi nnhyɛ Asiriahen nsa."

column2: "Mma hom nntsie Hezekia: na mbrɛ Asiriahen se nye yi
column3: Hom nye me nsiesie na hom mfir edzi mbra me nkyɛn; na hom mu obiara ndzidzi no wenyindua do
column4: na obiara n’adɔmbadua do bi na hom mu obiara nnom nankasa no supi mu nsu:"

column2: "nkodu dɛ mebɛba mabɛfa hom akɔ asaase a ɔtse dɛ homankasa hom asaase yi do
column3: eburow na wenyin asaase

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie ma Hezekia anndɔkɔdɔkɔw hom
column3: dɛ
column4: EWURADZE bɛgye hɛn. Ana amanaman enyame efi Asiriahen ne nsamu pɛn?"

column2: "Hamat na Arpad enyame no wɔwɔ henfa? Sefarvaim enyame no wɔwɔ henfa? Aso wɔagye Samaria efi me nsamu a?"
"Amanaman yi mu enyame nyinara mu woana mu na wɔagye hɔn asaase efi me nsamu
column3: ma EWURADZE rebɛgye Jerusalɛm efi me nsamu yi?"

column2: "Na wɔkaa hɔn ano too mu
column3: na woemmbua no asɛm biara: osiandɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm nye dɛ

column2: "Nna Hilkia ne ba Eliakim a ɔhwɛ fidua no do no
column3: na ɔkyerɛwfo Sebna
column5: dze hɔn ntar a wɔatsetsew mu baa Hezekia nkyɛn
column6: na wɔkaa Rabsake ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no."
